full_threads.body:
Hi Brittany,

Got that! This page was already published live.

Here's the link:
https://dsa.org.au/dsa-town-hall-2022/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

Hi Rica,

Can this please be a stand-alone page? We don't want to advertise it but it will be given to internal participants to access at home 😊

Brittany Tudela​​

Marketing Manager

Hi Brittany, 

We have updated the Town Hall page and ready for you to review it.

Here is the link:
https://dsa-staging.wolfiq.cloud/town-hall/

Let me know if that's good.

Hi @ricaV2 done the following updates

✅ Can this section be in bold
✅ Can we have a little calendar icon next to "next event"
✅ Can this button be in gradient and can we have this icon added to the button (without the circle surrounding it)
✅ Can this area please look similar to this?

https://dsa-staging.wolfiq.cloud/town-hall/

Time: +15mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Hope you had a lovely weekend! Always goes too quickly doesn't it haha.

Thank you for sending that through, some amends below 😊

Header: can we please update to attached image?

Can this section be in bold



Can we have a little calendar icon next to "next event"

Can this button be in gradient and can we have this icon added to the button (without the circle surrounding it)





Can this area please look similar to this?





Thank you!

Brittany Tudela​​

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

DSA would like a page added to the staging URL: https://dsa-staging.wolfiq.cloud/

Request from client:
—//—
Our internal comms team have asked us to build a page that they can use to support their participant town halls. This link would be shared with participants and staff.
—//—

The content to be used it attached. Can you please get one of our team to create the page and load the content? My first instinct is that Jaime may be the best suited to this task.

Any questions, please ask.

Hi Chris!

We finally have copy for the town hall page, woohoo!

Brittany Tudela​​
